transcription: Hi everyone, my name is Sean LeBlanc, a sales representative at the Dan Jemis Real Estate Team. Today we have 1135 Front Road in Amherstburg. But before I take you inside,  I'm going to give you a sneak preview of the 3D walkthrough tour. All our information can be found at danjemus.com. 1135 Front Road features three bedrooms plus an office that could easily be converted into a fourth bedroom. Both bathrooms have been completely redone. The kitchen features granite countertops and has been totally refinished to the nines. The backyard features over 300 feet of finished fenced yard with a storage shed and an amazing  playground area. With 400 feet of total frontage this house is beautifully set back from the road with a massively redone driveway and a two-car garage.  So  Do  There you have it. 1135 Front Road in Amherstburg. If you're thinking of seeing this house, I'd love to show it to you. If you're thinking of selling, remember we always offer free home evaluations. All our information can be found on the very next page. See you soon.  Bye!
